content.rendered:
Photo by pixabay

This Week in Genesis three amazing interviews with Chris Lema, Tonya Mork (from Know The Code), and Bill Erickson. Plus, some new Genesis plugins in the works and a *very* strong showcase to inspire you.

Hope you enjoy.

Themes

New theme coming soon from the super talented Jessica Barnard.

Impact Pro is in development! I'll be announcing the release date & posting some feature highlights soon! #GenesisWP pic.twitter.com/PuHN3vEhD2

— Jessica Barnard (@thepixelista) April 7, 2016

Wes is adding a few updates to his Aspire theme (which is also available on StudioPress for all you ‘All Themes’ customers).

We just added a Portfolio Template, WooCommerce Support, and a few more features to the Aspire Theme! https://t.co/zmppXpwF4G #genesiswp

— Wes Straham (@WesStraham) April 14, 2016

Chris Hufnagel is working on a theme called Keep Simple for Genesis.

Coming to a #WordPress install near you! The Keep Simple #genesiswp theme! Clean and simple! #WordPressTheme pic.twitter.com/KCapahbepb

— Chris Hufnagel (@ChrisHufnagel) April 12, 2016

Showcase

Showcase favourite, Ryan Townley for alphapress1.com

Just launched a new #genesiswp site for Alpha Press, a commercial printer in South SF >>> https://t.co/nGT4PE7bkq pic.twitter.com/iYiqSdj3f5

— Ryan Townley (@ryantownley) April 7, 2016

Two great sites from Pilcrow + Pixel. First, sharedfuturecic.org.uk

A newly redesigned site launched today for @sharedfuturecic – https://t.co/gQ7iRYjbdd – on #genesiswp, of course.

— Pilcrow + Pixel (@PilcrowPixel) April 11, 2016

…and thesleepworks.co.uk

…which in turn follows up the recent launch for @TheSleepWorks: https://t.co/giusYQ2EBR #genesiswp

— Pilcrow + Pixel (@PilcrowPixel) April 11, 2016

Peter Shilling for equitaspartners.com.au

It’s launch day (still) updated #GenesisWP site for Equitas Partners live today #WordPress https://t.co/cwGlEf41n2

— Peter Shilling (@PShilling) April 8, 2016

Brian Gardner for melyssagriffin.com

Just launched @NectarCollect’s new site design — https://t.co/iMUcKYgu9U #genesiswp (she did the great design work!)

— Brian Gardner (@bgardner) April 11, 2016

Shaan Nicol for 111tv.com.au

https://t.co/grG5pShbLt is go! #GenesisWP

— ChillyBin Web Design (@chillybindesign) April 8, 2016

Rafal Tomal relaunches his awesome inspiration site typespiration.com

Typespiration relaunched! by @RafalTomal: https://t.co/rBhZ2OXkxl

— Typespiration (@typespiration) April 11, 2016

Podcasts

It’s Carrie Dils and Chris Lema, rocking out on OfficeHours.fm. Go watch the replay!

I’m LIVE with @chrislema! Tag your questions with #officefm https://t.co/xjNcm4nNEa

— Office Hours Podcast (@officehoursfm) April 14, 2016

Best of the rest

Great interview with Tonya from KnowTheCode.io…

She -> @hellofromTonya is ONE amazing person. Read her story – https://t.co/A7nAjbPfXW #genesiswp #wordpress

— Davinder Singh (@idavinder) April 14, 2016

…and do check out Know The Code’s excellent Genesis Framework month with new tutorials popping up all the time!

Part 2 Markup & Wraps – Developer's Guide to Customizing Genesis "hands-on code lab" is waiting for you. https://t.co/bbkUmcW63L #genesiswp

— Know The Code (@KnowTheCodePro) April 13, 2016

Next up an interview with the always insightful Bill Erickson…

Candid Interview of WordPress Contributor Bill Erickson advises on #WordPress Issues >> https://t.co/OgMMzJigM9 pic.twitter.com/isFQttVQF9

— Cloudways (@Cloudways) April 6, 2016

…and his latest and greatest tutorial – Fixing the Post Title Link when Editing Comments – too

Fixing the Post Title Link when Editing Comments

Juan Rangel with a new Genesis plugin, Apparatus (I don’t have a link though…)

Apparatus a new #genesiswp plugin. 🙂 pic.twitter.com/4mFehwQlQg

— Juan Rangel (@WPZombies) April 8, 2016

Neil Gee teaches you how to add a text block via the customizer in WordPress.

Adding a Text Block via the Customizer in WordPress https://t.co/5LBIJbjGVG #genesiswp

— Neil Gee (@_neilgee) April 10, 2016

Jon Barratt has a major update to his WP Clips project.

WP Clips v1.3 major update now available! Safer, smarter and still totally free, Ideal for customizing #genesiswp – https://t.co/TD7mnMjPJG

— Jon Barratt (@KrolynStudios) April 13, 2016

Susan’s still rolling on with her Genesis4Beginners series of articles, if you’re new to Genesis go check it out.

On the blog today, another post in my #Genesis4Beginners #GenesisWP series: How to add a larger header image in… https://t.co/02L8tdlcXQ

— Susan Ramsey (@onehappystudio) April 8, 2016

A new customisation plugin for Genesis called Blox, launches its beta.

The beta for Blox is open: https://t.co/Dqsw5sJ4Gc. Built just for #genesiswp. Would love feedback. Official release is Monday.

— Blox (@bloxwp) April 14, 2016

While in, what I’m now calling, ‘Srikat Corner‘ (or should that be Korner?) this week…

Custom Taxonomy Images Grid with CPTs List in Genesis: https://t.co/vj2cxFWCRBhttps://t.co/0QoIpXRnx9 pic.twitter.com/HF2awaJW3Z

— Sridhar Katakam (@srikat) April 8, 2016

How to set up smooth scrolling for hash links in WordPress: https://t.co/DXZeJJOhNChttps://t.co/KwFOM7Djeb

— Sridhar Katakam (@srikat) April 9, 2016

How to display custom fields above other widgets of sidebar in Genesis:https://t.co/8TgMAZULw7#GenesisWP pic.twitter.com/ff01aqUzgu

— Sridhar Katakam (@srikat) April 12, 2016

Slide toggle Gravity Forms form by clicking a link/button in Primary Nav menu in Genesis:https://t.co/3UK9C3yTyehttps://t.co/xR5Ti9XnJ0

— Sridhar Katakam (@srikat) April 14, 2016

And finally…

In case you missed it, WordPress 4.5 is out…

WordPress 4.5 “Coleman” is now available for download – https://t.co/LFCSFC80AK #genesiswp #WordPress

— Davinder Singh (@idavinder) April 12, 2016

…with a whole lot of new features and changes.

Really helpful. WordPress 4.5 now allows users to sign in using either their username or email address as username. #genesiswp

— Tony Brennan (@BrennanTony) April 12, 2016

In new #WordPress default Image compression has been changed from 90 to 82 (meaning – more compression) #GenesisWP https://t.co/Qb7lWwDTst

— Davinder Singh (@idavinder) April 14, 2016

That’s all for this week, but please swing by next time when Tony Eppright (go follow him @_alphablossom) will be taking the controls.

(And the week after that, GenesisWP.guide will be celebrating it’s one year anniversary!)

Have a stellar weekend.

PS If you dig what I’m doing with these weekly updates, please consider subscribing below if you don’t already. I really appreciate it.
